original_text: So he brought him into his house, and gave provender unto the asses: and they washed their feet, and did eat and drink.
korean_text: 그를 데리고 자기 집에 들어가서 나귀에게 먹이니 그들이 발을 씻고 먹고 마시니라

sentences.original_text: So he brought him into his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그를 자기 집으로 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: and gave provender unto the asses
